DataSource.RecordSource:
SELECT MST_Department.Code AS MST_DepartmentCode, PRO_ProductionLine.Code AS PRO_ProductionLineCode, CST_ProductGroup.Code AS CST_ProductGroupCode, STD_CostElement.Name AS STD_CostElementName, ITM_Product.Code AS ITM_ProductCode, ITM_Product.Description AS ITM_ProductDescription, ITM_Product.Revision AS ITM_ProductRevision, MST_UnitOfMeasure.Code as MST_UnitOfMeasureCode,
cst_AllocationResult.Rate as FactoryRate, NULL as DepartmentRate, NULL as ProductionLineRate, NULL as ProductGroupRate,
cst_AllocationResult.Amount as FactotyCost, NULL as DepartmentCost, NULL as ProductionLineCost, NULL as ProductGroupCost,
cst_AllocationResult.ProductID, cst_ActCostAllocationMaster.PeriodName, cst_AllocationResult.CompletedQuantity, cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID, cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID, cst_AllocationResult.AllocationResultID, cst_AllocationResult.ActCostAllocationMasterID, cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID, cst_AllocationResult.CostElementID, ITM_Product.CCNID
FROM cst_AllocationResult INNER JOIN STD_CostElement ON cst_AllocationResult.CostElementID = STD_CostElement.CostElementID INNER JOIN cst_ActCostAllocationMaster ON cst_AllocationResult.ActCostAllocationMasterID = cst_ActCostAllocationMaster.ActCostAllocationMasterID INNER JOIN ITM_Product ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID INNER JOIN MST_UnitOfMeasure ON ITM_Product.StockUMID = MST_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureID
LEFT JOIN CST_ProductGroup ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID = CST_ProductGroup.ProductGroupID LEFT JOIN MST_Department ON cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID = MST_Department.DepartmentID LEFT JOIN PRO_ProductionLine ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID = PRO_ProductionLine.ProductionLineID
WHERE cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID IS NULL AND cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID IS NULL AND cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID IS NULL
UNION
SELECT MST_Department.Code AS MST_DepartmentCode, PRO_ProductionLine.Code AS PRO_ProductionLineCode, CST_ProductGroup.Code AS CST_ProductGroupCode, STD_CostElement.Name AS STD_CostElementName, ITM_Product.Code AS ITM_ProductCode, ITM_Product.Description AS ITM_ProductDescription, ITM_Product.Revision AS ITM_ProductRevision, MST_UnitOfMeasure.Code as MST_UnitOfMeasureCode,
NULL as FactoryRate, cst_AllocationResult.Rate as DepartmentRate, NULL as ProductionLineRate, NULL as ProductGroupRate,
NULL as FactotyCost, cst_AllocationResult.Amount as DepartmentCost, NULL as ProductionLineCost, NULL as ProductGroupCost,
cst_AllocationResult.ProductID, cst_ActCostAllocationMaster.PeriodName, cst_AllocationResult.CompletedQuantity, cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID, cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID, cst_AllocationResult.AllocationResultID, cst_AllocationResult.ActCostAllocationMasterID, cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID, cst_AllocationResult.CostElementID, ITM_Product.CCNID
FROM cst_AllocationResult INNER JOIN STD_CostElement ON cst_AllocationResult.CostElementID = STD_CostElement.CostElementID INNER JOIN cst_ActCostAllocationMaster ON cst_AllocationResult.ActCostAllocationMasterID = cst_ActCostAllocationMaster.ActCostAllocationMasterID INNER JOIN ITM_Product ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID INNER JOIN MST_UnitOfMeasure ON ITM_Product.StockUMID = MST_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureID
INNER JOIN MST_Department ON cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID = MST_Department.DepartmentID LEFT JOIN PRO_ProductionLine ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID = PRO_ProductionLine.ProductionLineID LEFT JOIN CST_ProductGroup ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID = CST_ProductGroup.ProductGroupID
WHERE cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID IS NOT NULL AND cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID IS NULL AND cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID IS NULL
UNION
SELECT MST_Department.Code AS MST_DepartmentCode, PRO_ProductionLine.Code AS PRO_ProductionLineCode, CST_ProductGroup.Code AS CST_ProductGroupCode, STD_CostElement.Name AS STD_CostElementName, ITM_Product.Code AS ITM_ProductCode, ITM_Product.Description AS ITM_ProductDescription, ITM_Product.Revision AS ITM_ProductRevision, MST_UnitOfMeasure.Code as MST_UnitOfMeasureCode,
NULL as FactoryRate, NULL as DepartmentRate, cst_AllocationResult.Rate as ProductionLineRate, NULL as ProductGroupRate,
NULL as FactotyCost, NULL as DepartmentCost, cst_AllocationResult.Amount as ProductionLineCost, NULL as ProductGroupCost,
cst_AllocationResult.ProductID, cst_ActCostAllocationMaster.PeriodName, cst_AllocationResult.CompletedQuantity, cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID, cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID, cst_AllocationResult.AllocationResultID, cst_AllocationResult.ActCostAllocationMasterID, cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID, cst_AllocationResult.CostElementID, ITM_Product.CCNID
FROM cst_AllocationResult INNER JOIN STD_CostElement ON cst_AllocationResult.CostElementID = STD_CostElement.CostElementID INNER JOIN cst_ActCostAllocationMaster ON cst_AllocationResult.ActCostAllocationMasterID = cst_ActCostAllocationMaster.ActCostAllocationMasterID INNER JOIN ITM_Product ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID INNER JOIN MST_UnitOfMeasure ON ITM_Product.StockUMID = MST_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureID
INNER JOIN MST_Department ON cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID = MST_Department.DepartmentID INNER JOIN PRO_ProductionLine ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID = PRO_ProductionLine.ProductionLineID LEFT JOIN CST_ProductGroup ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID = CST_ProductGroup.ProductGroupID
WHERE cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID IS NOT NULL AND cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID IS NOT NULL AND cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID IS NULL
UNION
SELECT MST_Department.Code AS MST_DepartmentCode, PRO_ProductionLine.Code AS PRO_ProductionLineCode, CST_ProductGroup.Code AS CST_ProductGroupCode, STD_CostElement.Name AS STD_CostElementName, ITM_Product.Code AS ITM_ProductCode, ITM_Product.Description AS ITM_ProductDescription, ITM_Product.Revision AS ITM_ProductRevision, MST_UnitOfMeasure.Code as MST_UnitOfMeasureCode,
NULL as FactoryRate, NULL as DepartmentRate, NULL as ProductionLineRate, cst_AllocationResult.Rate as ProductGroupRate,
NULL as FactotyCost, NULL as DepartmentCost, NULL as ProductionLineCost, cst_AllocationResult.Amount as ProductGroupCost,
cst_AllocationResult.ProductID, cst_ActCostAllocationMaster.PeriodName, cst_AllocationResult.CompletedQuantity, cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID, cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID, cst_AllocationResult.AllocationResultID, cst_AllocationResult.ActCostAllocationMasterID, cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID, cst_AllocationResult.CostElementID, ITM_Product.CCNID
FROM cst_AllocationResult INNER JOIN STD_CostElement ON cst_AllocationResult.CostElementID = STD_CostElement.CostElementID INNER JOIN cst_ActCostAllocationMaster ON cst_AllocationResult.ActCostAllocationMasterID = cst_ActCostAllocationMaster.ActCostAllocationMasterID INNER JOIN ITM_Product ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID INNER JOIN MST_UnitOfMeasure ON ITM_Product.StockUMID = MST_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureID
INNER JOIN CST_ProductGroup ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID = CST_ProductGroup.ProductGroupID INNER JOIN MST_Department ON cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID = MST_Department.DepartmentID INNER JOIN PRO_ProductionLine ON cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID = PRO_ProductionLine.ProductionLineID
WHERE cst_AllocationResult.DepartmentID IS NOT NULL AND cst_AllocationResult.ProductionLineID IS NOT NULL AND cst_AllocationResult.ProductGroupID IS NOT NULL

Section.Name: Detail
Section.OnPrint: Dim fldField Dim i For i = 0 To Detail.Fields.Count -1 If CStr(Detail.Fields(i).Tag) = "FORMAT_NUMERIC" Then If [Detail.Fields(i)] >= 0 Then Detail.Fields(i).BackColor = GRB(255, 0, 0) End If End If Next
